attributes.action: Give society the right to their own body.
attributes.additional_details: Why should anyone ask permission to consume a plant? Are we not free? Doesn't your body belong to you? How can anyone else make choices for us?! A plant that has many healing benefits such as cannabis should not be illegal, nor should we need permission to peacefully consume it.
attributes.background: Why should anything I choose to put into my body be illegal? Smoking cigarettes is my choice, as well as consuming alcohol - they both are bad for health however my body = my choice. CANNABIS has never killed anyone, we should all be free to make our own choices. We demand Freedom to our own bodies!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you would like the Government to legalize cannabis, you could sign the petition below: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168911
